text:
Troops | NYC | Full-Time | On Site | Salary+Equity+Benefits We are a Seed-stage VC-backed startup building AI-powered tools for sales people (making a massive impact on a trillion $$ market.

Looking for a senior / architect dev to be engineering hire #3 who wants to do Scala (functional experience or JVM exp preferred).

Looking for intelligent, kind and fun people that are scrappy and looking to make a huge impact. Please apply here: http://gettroops.com/join-the-team/#softwareengineer
